channel.title: Markdown on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 14 Jul 2017 00:00
item.description:
I’ve really liked Standard Notes and Simplenote. Both have markdown, tag support and sync across machines. I’d weigh in on the former for encryption and the latter for version control. I’ve never used nvAlt, so not quite sure what I’m stacking against.

in reply to: « Oatmeal

Internet! I need help. I’ve been using nvALT for years and years, and have years and years of content in it.

Srikanth Perinkulam
item.content:encoded:
I’ve really liked Standard Notes and Simplenote. Both have markdown, tag support and sync across machines. I’d weigh in on the former for encryption and the latter for version control. I’ve never used nvAlt, so not quite sure what I’m stacking against.

in reply to: « Oatmeal
